STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Get Notified of the Latest Activity on the Blockchain
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Ahead of the Ethereum Curve
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from developers already using our Ethereum transaction tracking app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With this app, I can easily monitor new Ethereum transactions as they occur. The real-time updates and filtering options are incredibly useful.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This Ethereum transaction finder helps me stay on top of the latest activity on the blockchain. The customizable alerts are a game-changer.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how user-friendly this app is. Finding and tracking Ethereum transactions has never been easier for my research projects.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions About Ethereum Transaction Explorer
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about using our app to discover new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Ethereum Transaction Explorer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: The Ethereum Transaction Explorer is a tool that allows you to monitor and discover new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new blocks being added to the blockchain. When a new block is detected, we parse all the transactions included and surface the latest ones through our user interface.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kind of transactions can I see?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can view all types of Ethereum transactions including token transfers, smart contract deployments, and interactions with decentralized applications (DApps).
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a delay in showing new transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: No, our app updates with new transactions within seconds after they are included in a new Ethereum block, providing you with extremely low latency data.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I filter or search transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, you can filter transactions by token type, smart contract address, transaction value, and more. You can also search for specific transaction hashes, addresses or data values.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead with real-time monitoring of the Ethereum blockchain
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing our new Ethereum transaction monitoring tool!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Get real-time alerts for new Ethereum transactions matching your custom filters. Stay ahead of the curve.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Discover the latest Ethereum transactions in real-time with our powerful explorer tool.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Stay up-to-date on all incoming and outgoing transfers across the Ethereum blockchain.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to search, filter, and analyze transaction data.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Join our community of Ethereum enthusiasts today and unlock valuable insights.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_1: Real-time transaction monitoring across the Ethereum network
FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_2: Advanced search and filtering capabilities for transactions
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay up-to-date with the latest Ethereum transactions. EtherScan provides real-time monitoring of the Ethereum blockchain to help you track new transactions as they occur. Powered by a decentralized network of nodes, our service ensures transparency and reliability.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge transaction monitoring system. Get instant alerts for new Ethereum transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain deep insights into every transaction with our detailed transaction data. View the sender, recipient, value transferred, gas fees, and more.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Easily find the transactions you're looking for with our powerful search and filtering capabilities. Search by address, value, block number, and more.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Access a comprehensive archive of past Ethereum transactions, allowing you to analyze trends and patterns over time.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Never miss an important transaction. Set up custom alerts and receive notifications via email, SMS, or integrated messaging platforms.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Seamlessly integrate our transaction monitoring capabilities into your own applications with our well-documented and easy-to-use API.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction monitoring app. Get instant alerts for new transactions as they happen.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve by monitoring new transactions as they happen.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve by monitoring the latest transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get Notified of New Ethereum Transactions
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve by receiving alerts for the latest transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Monitoring App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app connects directly to the Ethereum blockchain and continuously scans for new transactions in real-time. When a new transaction is detected, we immediately notify you via push notification or email.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What information is provided about each transaction?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: For each new transaction detected, we provide the transaction hash, sender and recipient addresses, amount transferred (in ETH), and a link to view the transaction details on Etherscan.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I filter transactions based on specific criteria?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, you can set up custom filters to only receive notifications for transactions meeting certain criteria, such as transactions above a certain ETH value or transactions involving specific wallet addresses.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a free trial or paid subscription?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer a 14-day free trial to test out the app. After that, pricing starts at $9.99 per month for basic transaction monitoring, with more advanced filtering and notification options available on our premium plans.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app constantly scans the Ethereum blockchain for new transactions, allowing you to stay up-to-date with the latest activity.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Filter transactions by address, value, gas price, and more. Sort by time, value, or any other parameter to find what you need quickly.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get notified immediately when transactions matching your criteria occur. Never miss an important event on the Ethereum network.
